etymology.description: 李(李) (Lǐ, "a common Chinese surname"), 旭(旭) (xù, "rising sun; dawn"), 婷(婷) (tíng, "graceful; elegant")
etymology.interpretation: The name combines 李(李) (Lǐ, "a common Chinese surname") with 旭(旭) (xù, "rising sun; dawn") and 婷(婷) (tíng, "graceful; elegant"), suggesting a person associated with grace and new beginnings.

examples.chinese: 李旭婷是我的好朋友(李旭婷是我的好朋友)。
examples.pinyin: Lǐ Xùtíng shì wǒ de hǎo péngyǒu.
examples.english: Li Xùtíng is my good friend.

examples.chinese: 昨天我见到李旭婷(昨天我見到李旭婷)，她穿着漂亮的衣服(她穿著漂亮的衣服)。
examples.pinyin: Zuótiān wǒ jiàn dào Lǐ Xùtíng, tā chuānzhe piàoliang de yīfú.
examples.english: Yesterday I met Li Xùtíng, and she was wearing beautiful clothes.

examples.chinese: 李旭婷热爱读书(李旭婷熱愛讀書)，每天都在图书馆自习(每天都在圖書館自習)。
examples.pinyin: Lǐ Xùtíng rè'ài dúshū, měitiān dōu zài túshūguǎn zìxí.
examples.english: Li Xùtíng loves reading and studies in the library every day.
